name: wicked-coolkit-user
description: A fun, nostalgic web toolkit built on Heroku and Salesforce.

scripts.build: npm run build:vendor && if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run build:minify || echo 'Not minifying'
scripts.build:minify: for file in public/resources/*.js; do terser $file --compress --mangle -o public/resources/`basename $file`; done
